title: Alienware 25 Gaming Monitor - AW2518Hf, Full HD @ Native 240 Hz, 16:9, 1ms Response Time, DP, HDMI 2.0a, USB 3.0, AMD FreeSync, Tilt, Swivel, Height-Adjustable (Renewed)

reviews.name: Ashley Fernandez
reviews.review: Product lasted about 40 days and went out on me, it was refurbished so I guess get what you pay for. Was really wanting this monitor to work out.

reviews.name: hrhill3
reviews.review: My son designed his own gaming computer and picked this screen out .. loves it .. he also picked out a high graphics card and this was the monitor that was able to handle it and really show the graphics

reviews.name: thomas
reviews.review: All around the best monitor I ever had. The quality is amazing in every way!

reviews.name: PublicName
reviews.reviewTitle: Refurbished goods are never "Like New", but this one might be worth the trade off
reviews.review: It didn't come with a display port cord and was refurbished being promised as like new, but had some minor screen damage. Saved a lot of money for an originally great product.

reviews.review: The stand is too big

reviews.name: Amysterz
reviews.review: I love it

reviews.name: Austin
reviews.review: No complaints this monitor will up your gameplay!

reviews.name: Boyd
reviews.review: I got this monitor from someone off of Craigslist and its being great for games that can run that 240hz display the image quality doesn't hold up to 2k if you compare it to a game like cyberpunk or forza or halo but thats not really what this is meant for so thats not fair but using it for the games its meant for mainly seige and csgo its amazing also there is no ghosting until you put it into the super fast or extreme mode even then its not noticeable in practice

reviews.name: Leone
reviews.review: Quality control excuse to open the box. Send me a used monitor.

title: Lenovo L28u-30 28-inch IPS Monitor, UHD 4K Display, Ultra-Thin Bezels, AMD FreeSync, 4ms, 60Hz, HDMI, DisplayPort, Low Blue Light, VESA Mount Capable
description:
The Lenovo L28u-30 computer monitor has a 28-inch 4K display with an ultra-thin bezel that's ideal for home entertainment and gaming. With 3840 x 2160 resolution, you'll enjoy astounding clarity with colors that flow seamlessly whether you're streaming that new movie or playing your favorite game. The quick 4ms response time and AMD FreeSync™* technology ensure smooth gameplay, elevating your experience. The wide viewing angles (up to 178°) enabled by the In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel lets you enjoy what you're watching from any position without color shift or distortion. Natural Low Blue Light technology minimizes eyestrain, while Eyesafe Display Certification meets the industry standards for low blue light and high color performance. Plus, with 3-side NearEdgeless bezels, you'll enjoy maximum screen space with less distraction.

The L28u-30 monitor displays vivid colors covering an exceptionally wide color range with high accuracy at 99% in the sRGB gamut and 90% in the DCI-P3 color gamut. Additionally, the 10-bit profile can display 1.07 billion colors, so you'll enjoy spectacular visuals on your 4K monitor. HDMI 2.0 and DisplayPort 1.2 video input ports make sure that your video signal has the highest resolution available.

*AMD Freesync™ is enabled for AMD Radeon™ Series graphics cards.

reviews.name: james m edwards
reviews.review: Changed out 6 Dell monitors 24 to 30 in for 6 Lenovo 28 to 32 inch with displayport and hdmi connections and could not be happier. The Dells were old and very HOT, these run almost at room temperature. Colors vibrant, response time is twice what the Dells were (there were old). UNIFORM color and brightness with screen adjustment that makes sense unlike almost all the other monitors I shopped. The price is a bargain. Would absolutely buy again without hesitation.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.reviewTitle: Top quality image, perfect for reading text
reviews.review: Top quality image, perfect for reading text

reviews.name: N Drew
reviews.review: Great monitor- easy to set up

reviews.name: thequest
reviews.review: The picture quality is stunning.

reviews.name: Jackie
reviews.reviewTitle: Great 4K monitor at a great price
reviews.review: I'm really happy with this 4K monitor. I've purchased 3 of them (1 for home and 2 for office). Great picture and great value!

reviews.name: Rob Anglin
reviews.review: I bought (2) of these; they are advertised as new when they are clearly used/refurbished. Buyer beware!

reviews.name: Tom G
reviews.reviewTitle: Buyer Beware! Weird Screen issue after 6 months
reviews.review: This monitor worked really well for 6 months. However, today, I noticed a weird square splotched spot in the upper left corner of the screen. Not sure what it is or how to fix it. I couldn't find a solution on the internet. If you need a high end monitor for gaming, this might be a good option. But, if just need a monitor for work, I would suggest something cheaper and more basic. It probably will last longer than this one.

reviews.name: Patrick O'Malley
reviews.review: I just wanted a monitor with 4k resolution to fit more text on a page (not for movies), and this is a good value at the price point.

reviews.name: MG537
reviews.reviewTitle: Not the most colour accurate monitor
reviews.review:
For around $450 (canadian) this monitor is a bargain if the 4K resolution is all you're looking for.
I bought this needing the screen Real estate that a 28" inch 4K monitor would bring.
In my line of work I need to keep many Windows Open at a Time so the more real estate the better.
I put it next to my older Dell 24" (it too a 4K) and you can clearly see the Lenovo having a slight yellowish tint.
No big deal if MS Office, and UNIX/Linux consoles are your thing.
Not suitable for photo/video editing where colour accuracy is important.
Flimsy stand but as long as you don't constantly bump your desk, it's OK.

title: Thinlerain PC Monitor 17-inch 4:3 LED Backlit Monitor 1280 X 1024, 60 Hz Refresh Rate, 5Ms Response Time, VESA Mountable, VGA, HDMI, TN Panel, Built-in Speakers

About this item

LED Monitor - 1280*1024 native resolution screen. LED Screen 250 nits brightness. 1000:1 Contrast Ratio, Aspect Ratio Standard (4:3)

reviews.name: tiffany
reviews.reviewTitle: Would recommend if you need a small office monitor
reviews.review:
Color is not adjustable so everything is muted from email to websites. Works fine with the exception of the color being off. I will be replacing with a better monitor as I need color for some of the reports I use.

5/3/22 I am editing this recommendation as the company reached out to me after my review and sent me a new monitor. This one was bought for my home office as a second screen and I had already bought a replacement since the colors/brightness was an issue for my needs however the company sent me a bigger screen that allows for color/brightness adjustments and it works wonderfully. Highly recommend if for no other reason than the company wants the customer happy.

reviews.name: Brenda Thatcher
reviews.review: Lovely piece of equipment. I don't game so I don't have that answer buy everything was in hand and it the display and sound are fabulous

reviews.name: Keith
reviews.review: This monitor is more suitable for use as an extra monitor in the office. The 17inch and 4:3 can be better for viewing some data and reading documents/Excel. I recommend this monitor for some people who work in the office.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.reviewTitle: Good things come in small packages!
reviews.review: The packaging was smaller than I expected, but the monitor arrived intact and fully functional. I connected it up to my NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 & it worked perfectly. I did have to adjust my display settings to share monitors and to make my larger monitor primary (I use the 17" for research/walkthrus). Excellent replacement for an LCD panel with pixel rot & more energy efficient!

reviews.name: Gary
reviews.reviewTitle: Great Monitor at a Great Price!
reviews.review:
This monitor is perfect for what we need; which is a basically square one. The only issue I had is that we needed to remove the old screw in cable and instead use ONLY the HDMI cable. It's been a while since I bought a monitor, so only using the HDMI wasn't clear to me when I opened the box....my fault.

I highly recommend this monitor!!!

reviews.name: Louise Hampton
reviews.review: Does a great job with good picture quality. Definitely worth the money would recommend for great for security systems, gaming and family computers.

reviews.name: C. Rosselli
reviews.review: Bought this monitor as a second monitor for my desktop. The size is what I was most interested in as I don't have room for another large monitor. This is very decent for the money. The picture if very clear and I was pleasantly surprised. Working great thus far.

reviews.name: Cory Camallieri
reviews.review: A well-designed sturdy functional small Monitor with clever touch controls for adjustment.

reviews.name: Kell Innes
reviews.review: Glad I found this portable monitor at the price point that I did. I didn’t need anything overly expensive. I’m now working 100% remote and needed a second monitor for when I travel, and this fits the bill. Easy to travel with and not too heavy. Only downside is that as others have stated, the screen is a little dark even when the brightness is turned all the way up. This hasn’t prevented me from getting work done, but it would be nice if the screen was brighter. But again, for the price paid, I’m satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.name: Tom
reviews.review: Great with the monitor! I am a programmer. I just want to have a smaller screen delegated for my slack and meeting. This is perfect! Their support is also excellent too! I also turn this into TV in the car while traveling. One of the best products I've purchased. love it

reviews.name: JoDee
reviews.reviewTitle: A GREAT EXTRA MONITOR. GREAT PRICE. GREAT QUALITY
reviews.review: Great extra monitor. Came with instructions. Great Price. I had a question and the seller was quick to respond.

reviews.name: KarenMike
reviews.review: Wonderful second screen for my laptop while away from home.

reviews.name: Jay
reviews.reviewTitle: It works very well for my security camera.
reviews.review: It is a great 13.3 inch portable monitor that is compatible with variaty of connections. It comes with HDMI, VGA and 3.5mm Audio input interface. I use it for my security camera system and it works very well.

reviews.name: JH in MN
reviews.review: I purchased this for use in my work truck, so I could have a portable monitor and keyboard that I could place in front of me, but was small and light enough to set up as I moved from site to site. My laptop is on a stand by passenger seat and I was developing significant neck strain from twisting and leaning over to read screen and type. I fabricated a simple bracket that clips onto steering wheel and I set the monitor on it while working, and have the keyboard on my lap. When I'm done, the keyboard sits on the center console and I place the monitor in a sleeve on the floor in front of the console. With all the movement back and forth, I have yet to lose a connection and colors and clarity are great. Since it sits only 16 - 20" from my face, the smaller screen size is no problem. Seems well constructed - only one small issue - wish the menu keys on back were a bit more protected as I have changed screen setting as it leaned against center of steering wheel, but I put two screws in Vesa bracket holes and that solved that issue.

reviews.name: New golfer
reviews.review: Easy to set up and works great.

reviews.name: Alicia Guilloty
reviews.review: Excelente para visualizar cámaras de seguridad con una pequeña pantalla sobre el escritorio.

reviews.name: Cortexpert
reviews.reviewTitle: OK monitor when powered from USB
reviews.review: Plugged in on receipt using the 12v UK adapter supplied - the monitor lit up, said hello and promptly turned off again before my Windows 10 PC could recognize it. Was about to send it back but thought to try powering from USB on my PC and then it worked fine. Micro USB cable is not supplied. I'm using it as a second monitor in portrait mode on a VSG 75x75 VESA stand. Display quality appears good. I see others also had issues using the 12v adapter but I haven't researched whether it's the adapter or the monitor that's at fault. Update: Two-months on and the monitor still works fine using USB power.

reviews.name: Qin Yu
reviews.review: Great portable monitor with all necessary accessories included. I bought it for working while travelling. It serves the purpose perfectly. The resolution is brilliant and color is bright for a portable monitor. I also love the protective case included. It protects the monitor well and helps it stand alone. Overall i am really happy with this purchase.

reviews.name: "cowboy_dan"
reviews.review: Got it as a 2nd monitor that doesn't take up too much space so I could keep an eye on the football, twitch etc whilst I do something else on the main screen. It doesn't seem made for this purpose (i.e. wires in the side) but does exactly what I wanted it to do.

reviews.name: Steven
reviews.review: My screen wont work charger is making a crazy noice am worried

reviews.name: Kym H
reviews.reviewTitle: Very High Quality Surprise - Brilliant Image and Multi-Touch
reviews.review:
I am surprised at just how high quality this unit appears.

A simply brilliant picture and nice feel and control over multi-touch features.

As a retired pro-photographer, will happily use this for sorting and rating digital images as it's so much easier to zoom and move around images than with a mouse.

It's working well with my Windows 11 and Windows 10 PC's, notebook and HP 2in1 touch screen notebook without the need to install drivers or apps.

I only purchased this to use for easier control of instruments with my Flight Simulator Rig but quickly realized it's going to get much more use than just that.

I did not think a power adapter was included for some reason but it was and the included little stand is surprisingly stable.

The HDMI cable was a tad short for me but I had an extender cable in my kit.

I highly recommended this touch screen and it arrived to me in South Australia the very next morning with  Prime Delivery.

{Lifetime Warranty} We Promise Lifetime Warranty,If you have any Problem with the monitor,Please Contact us

reviews.name: Alex Alexander
reviews.review:
TL:DR version at the bottom, if you want to skip the review.

Disregard those that moan about the image quality not being perfect. This is a sub-$80 monitor (Prime Day it was $66ish) and should be reviewed as a sub-$80 monitor. It should also NOT be reviewed that its performance is lackluster when used as a DSLR/M43/etc. camera mounted monitor; this isn't an Atomos monitor - nor is it priced as such.

What it is: an ~$80 monitor with VGA, HDMI, composite, and BNC video inputs. This would be a fantastic monitor to put in a portable IT kit, for connecting to a KVM or directly to a server/workstation for troubleshooting.

My particular use case is for a homemade luggable computer of sorts. I'm a fan of 8 bit era computers, as well as certain modern takes on that era of computers, such as the Color Maximite 1, Color Maximite 2, BASIC Engine, BASIC Engine (Orange Pi edition), et al.

My needs for this particular project were:
1: DC input, using an external power source - so that I can easily power it via battery.
This input needed to be of relatively low watt draw.
2: HDMI, VGA, and composite inputs
3: At least standard HD resolution of 1280x720 or more
4: The overall monitor size needs to be relatively close to a smaller keyboard. Not necessarily a 60% sized keyboard, but something close to that.
5: $ cheap $, just in case the project doesn't work out

I've machined a prototype case out of wood (somewhat similar to a Pi-Top Raspberry Pi laptop) and fitted the original BASIC Engine retro computer, BASIC Engine OPi edition, and a Color Maximite 2 inside the lower half of the luggable laptop. My power supply needs, at least for now, is a Makita LXT battery adapter mounted to the outside of the rear part of the upper laptop housing - with wires routed into the lower half and connected to two buck DC-DC converters (one set at 12V and one set for 5V). The BASIC Engine Orange Pi edition is connected to the HDMI input, the BASIC Engine original edition is connected to the composite input, and the Color Maximite 2 is connected to the VGA input. All are working flawlessly. The color reproduction is 100% acceptable for my use case.

The only negative, at least for my use case, is the tight fit of the VGA and HDMI connectors. Fortunately, I had a small HDMI male to micro-HDMI adapter that is barely larger than just the male part of a full-sized HDMI cable by itself. I connected a small gauge, coiled cable to that.

TL:DR version: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT TO EDIT VIDEOS AND PHOTOS for professional or similar purposes!!! You are not and cannot spend $80 and get what you want....you HAVE to spend much more than what this monitors costs. This monitor is the bee's knees if you want to game on the go, from 8 bit retro computers over composite all the way to the 2020 generation of high end consoles over HDMI and all sorts of devices in between. This would be a great tool to put in an IT tool kit. I most definitely recommend this!

reviews.name: amber
reviews.review: Got this monitor to watch TV in my kitchen while cooking, and couldn't not be easier to use, comes with a lot of different imputs, I used HDMI to connect  fire stick and was up an running in a minute, image quality is very clear, the sound it's okay for this little thing. I really recommend it as a extra TV, it does the job very well for a good price.

reviews.name: Zantosa
reviews.reviewTitle: Does what it's supposed to do, great customer service
reviews.review: I purchased this to use as a secondary monitor for a custom computer I was building. It worked quite well for several weeks, and then seemed to be having some sort of problem with the power plug, where the external power supply plugged into the back of the monitor. It would flicker when I moved the monitor, and then would not turn back on for a few minutes. I had exceeded the  return window, so I contacted the seller, and they responded quickly, went through some basic troubleshooting, and determined it wasn't anything I was doing. Then they just asked for a shipping address, and sent me a new monitor, it arrived in a few days and is working perfectly. I think this is probably the fastest response and best response I have ever had working directly with a seller, and the replacement actually was faster than the original order. I was originally going to give this 3 stars, but the customer service and the working replacement made me want to bump it up quite a bit. It's a cheap monitor, and it may have issues, but the company will make good on it even if they don't have to. That's worth a lot.

reviews.name: Gene Baginski
reviews.review: I use this as a portable spot monitor. It has the connections I need for troubleshooting CCTV issues. It is also usable as a 2nd Monitor for a Laptop for troubleshooting a laptop display.

reviews.name: PTVEGAS
reviews.review: I was pleasantly surprised as it is very bright, and very clear. I use it when a larger server needs a reboot and works great.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: I read all the reviews on these little monitors and finally decided on this one. Great picture quality for a little screen, with good color also. If you are sitting this on a flat surface you will need a 90 degree hdmi cable as a straight one has trouble bending underneath it. I like that the buttons are on the back as I don't have to look at them then.

reviews.name: Cbow
reviews.review: Our Prechen 11.6 Inch CCTV HDMI Monitor has worked well for about 9 months, then is started getting lines, and blinking... the seller has been quick to send us a replacement at no charge.. very happy.

reviews.name: Nana of 5
reviews.review: Works well for a screen for our grandsons retro gaming system! I think if I ever need it for a second screen for my computer it would work great too

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: Needed a small monitor for set up of my cctv. Good picture and the size I needed.

reviews.name: Ali
reviews.review:
It's good for its value, this is worth it for100$

Not the greatest but does the job.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: extra tv in my kitchen so i dont miss any TDs

reviews.name: steve just
reviews.review: Works great

reviews.name: Rosa Robins
reviews.review: This item is exactly what I needed. Arrived well packaged and ahead of time. Thank you
